docs.snippet: Ode to 'Joy.' you'll notice that appended to the usual publisher data in the listing for "The Joy of Sex" on the Best Seller List is a paperback price. "Joy" is indeed busting out all over the bookstores in a large-size paperback format, retailing...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ode to 'Joy.' you'll notice that appended to the usual publisher data in the listing for "The Joy of Sex" on the Best Seller List is a paperback price. "Joy" is indeed busting out all over the bookstores in a large-size paperback format, retailing for $4.95. Simon Schuster reports the first printing of 625,000 is already sold out and another printing of half a million has been ordered.
